00053 AnnotationConverterEngine * AnnotationConverterEngine::FromBase(BaseEngine *engine)
00054 {
00055     if (engine != NULL && engine->getEngineName() == AnnotationConverterEngine::EngineName())
00056     {
00057         return (AnnotationConverterEngine *)engine;
00058     }
00059     return NULL;
00060 }

00063 AnnotationConverterEngine::AnnotationConverterEngine() 
00064 {
00065     defineOptions();
00066     m_annotationDb = NULL;
00067     m_csvHeadersToInformationTablePtr = NULL;
00068     m_annotationTable = NULL;
00069     m_localizationTable = NULL;
00070     m_chromosomeTable = NULL;        
00071 }
00072 
00073 AnnotationConverterEngine::~AnnotationConverterEngine() 
00074 {
00075     clear();
00076 }

00078 void AnnotationConverterEngine::clear()
00079 {    
00080     if (m_csvHeadersToInformationTablePtr!= NULL) delete m_csvHeadersToInformationTablePtr;
00081     if (m_annotationTable!= NULL) delete m_annotationTable;
00082     if (m_localizationTable!= NULL) delete m_localizationTable;
00083     if (m_chromosomeTable!= NULL) delete m_chromosomeTable;
00084     if (m_cdfInformationTable!= NULL) delete m_cdfInformationTable;        
00085 }

00087 static const char* SWITCH_DB_FILE = "db-file";
00088 static const char* SWITCH_DB_TEMPLATE = "db-template";
00089 static const char* SWITCH_TSV_FILE = "tsv-file";
00090 static const char* SWITCH_TSV_FILES = "tsv-files";
00091 static const char* SWITCH_ARRAY_CONFIG = "array-config";
00092 static const char* SWITCH_ARRAY_SET = "array-set";
00093 static const char* MESSAGE_DELAY = "message-delay";
00094 
00095 void AnnotationConverterEngine::defineOptions() 
00096 {
00097     defineOptionSection("Input Options");
00098     defineOption("", SWITCH_DB_TEMPLATE, PgOpt::STRING_OPT, "Sqllite Annotation database template file","");
00099     defineOption("", SWITCH_DB_FILE, PgOpt::STRING_OPT, "Target Sqllite Annotation database file","");    
00100     defineOption("", SWITCH_TSV_FILE, PgOpt::STRING_OPT, "Delimited text file to import in to Annotation table. Use either TCV or CSV-file format","");
00101     defineOption("", SWITCH_TSV_FILES, PgOpt::STRING_OPT, "Text file specifying TSV files to process, one per line","");
00102     defineOption("", SWITCH_ARRAY_CONFIG, PgOpt::STRING_OPT, "Array type specific configuration file.","");
00103     defineOption("", SWITCH_ARRAY_SET, PgOpt::STRING_OPT, "Array set name.","");
00104     defineOption("", MESSAGE_DELAY, PgOpt::STRING_OPT, "Message Delay (in milliseconds) for the UI tool.","");
00105 }

00107 void AnnotationConverterEngine::defineStates() { }

00109 /**
00110 * Make sure that our options are sane. Call Err::errAbort if not.
00111 */
00112 
00113 // -db-file GenomeWideSNP_6.na30.annot.db  -tsv-file GenomeWideSNP_6.na30.annot.small.csv  -array-config GenomeWideSNP_6.arrayconfig
00114 // or
00115 // -db-file GenomeWideSNP_6.na30.annot.db  -tsv-files ListOfTsvToLoad.txt  -array-config GenomeWideSNP_6.arrayconfig
00116 
00117 void AnnotationConverterEngine::checkOptionsImp()
00118 {
00119            
00120      //Add template name and copy into db every time     
00121      CheckSingleRequiredSwitch(SWITCH_DB_TEMPLATE, m_dbTemplate);
00122      CheckSingleRequiredSwitch(SWITCH_DB_FILE, m_dbFileName);
00123      CheckSingleRequiredSwitch(SWITCH_ARRAY_CONFIG, m_arraySpecificConfig);
00124      
00125      m_tsvFileName = getOpt(SWITCH_TSV_FILE);
00126      m_tsvListFileName = getOpt(SWITCH_TSV_FILES);
00127          m_arraySetName = getOpt(SWITCH_ARRAY_SET);
00128      
00129      if (!Fs::fileExists(m_dbTemplate))
00130      {
00131           Err::errAbort("Template file '" + m_dbTemplate + "'" + " doesn't exist");
00132      }
00133     
00134      if (m_tsvFileName.empty() && m_tsvListFileName.empty()) 
00135      {
00136         std::stringstream message;
00137         message << "Either '" << SWITCH_TSV_FILE << "' or '" << SWITCH_TSV_FILES << "' must be specified!";
00138         Err::errAbort(message.str());
00139      }
00140      
00141      if (m_tsvFileName != "" && m_tsvListFileName != "") 
00142      {
00143         std::stringstream message;
00144         message << "Both '" << SWITCH_TSV_FILE << "' and '" << SWITCH_TSV_FILES << "' are specified. Only one of them can be used at a time!";        
00145         Err::errAbort(message.str());
00146      } 
00147      
00148      m_listOfTsvFiles.clear();     
00149      if (m_tsvFileName != "")
00150      { // "tsv-file" specified - loading a single file 
00151         m_listOfTsvFiles.push_back(m_tsvFileName);
00152      }
00153      else
00154      {
00155         GetTsvFiles(); 
00156      } 
00157      
00158      string messageDelay =  getOpt(MESSAGE_DELAY);
00159      if (messageDelay != "")  
00160      {
00161         AptVerboseWrapper::Delay = atoi(messageDelay.c_str());
00162      }
00163 }
00164 
00165 
00166 void AnnotationConverterEngine::GetTsvFiles() 
00167 {
00168     if (!Fs::fileExists(m_tsvListFileName))
00169     {
00170          Err::errAbort("List file '" + m_tsvListFileName + "'" + " doesn't exist");
00171     }
00172     
00173     m_listOfTsvFiles.clear();
00174     
00175     std::ifstream infile(m_tsvListFileName.c_str(), std::ios_base::in);
00176     
00177     std::string fileName;
00178     while (getline(infile, fileName, '\n'))
00179     {
00180         Util::trimString(fileName);
00181         if (false == fileName.empty())
00182         {                
00183             std::vector<string>::iterator pos = find(m_listOfTsvFiles.begin(), m_listOfTsvFiles.end(), fileName);
00184             if ( pos != m_listOfTsvFiles.end())
00185             {
00186                 Err::errAbort("Duplicated file name '" + fileName + "' in the list file!" );
00187             }     
00188             m_listOfTsvFiles.push_back (fileName);
00189         }
00190     }
00191     
00192     if (m_listOfTsvFiles.size() == 0)
00193     {
00194          Err::errAbort("List file '" + m_tsvListFileName + "'" + " has no files to import!");
00195     }
00196     
00197     std::vector<std::string>::iterator fileIterator;
00198     for (fileIterator = m_listOfTsvFiles.begin(); fileIterator != m_listOfTsvFiles.end(); fileIterator++)
00199     {
00200         std::string fileName = *fileIterator;
00201         if (!Fs::fileExists(fileName))
00202         {
00203             Err::errAbort("File '" + fileName + "' listed in the '" + m_tsvListFileName + "' cannot be found!");
00204         }
00205     }
00206     
00207     std::stringstream message;
00208     message << "'" << m_tsvListFileName << "'" << " has " << m_listOfTsvFiles.size() << " files to load";
00209     
00210     AptVerboseWrapper::out(2, message.str());    
00211 }
00212 
00213 void AnnotationConverterEngine::CheckSingleRequiredSwitch(const char* SwitchName, std::string& SwitchValue)
00214 {
00215      SwitchValue = getOpt(SwitchName);
00216          
00217      if (SwitchValue.empty()) 
00218      {
00219         std::stringstream message;
00220         message  << "Must specify '" << SwitchName << "'!";
00221         Err::errAbort(message.str());        
00222      }
00223 }
00224 
00225 void AnnotationConverterEngine::LoadConfiguration(string FileName)
00226 {        
00227     try
00228     {        
00229         if (!Fs::fileExists(FileName))
00230         {
00231             std::stringstream message;
00232             message << CANNOT_FIND_CONFIGURATION_FILE << FileName << "'!";
00233             Err::errAbort(message.str()); 
00234         }
00235         m_configuration.LoadConfigurationFile(FileName);
00236     }
00237     catch (std::exception& exception)
00238     {
00239         std::string message =   ERROR_LOADING_CONFIGURATION_FILE;       
00240             message += exception.what();
00241             Err::errAbort(message);
00242     }
00243     catch (...)
00244     {        
00245             Err::errAbort(ERROR_LOADING_CONFIGURATION_FILE);
00246     }
00247 }

00255 void AnnotationConverterEngine::ExecuteNonQuery(std::string SqlStatement)
00256 {
00257       char *errorMessage = NULL;
00258       if(sqlite3_exec(m_annotationDb, SqlStatement.c_str(), NULL, 0, &errorMessage) != SQLITE_OK)
00259       {
00260             std::stringstream message;
00261             message << " Cannot execute query! " << SqlStatement;
00262             if (errorMessage != NULL)
00263             {
00264                 message << errorMessage;
00265                 delete(errorMessage);
00266             }
00267             throw Except(message.str().c_str());
00268        }
00269 }
00270 
00271 void AnnotationConverterEngine::BeginTransaction()
00272 {
00273     ExecuteNonQuery("BEGIN TRANSACTION");
00274 }
00275 
00276 void AnnotationConverterEngine::CommitTransaction()
00277 {
00278     ExecuteNonQuery("COMMIT TRANSACTION");
00279 }
00280 
00281 void AnnotationConverterEngine::RollbackTransaction()
00282 {
00283     ExecuteNonQuery("ROLLBACK TRANSACTION");
00284 }
00285 
00286 void AnnotationConverterEngine::CloseDbAndRemoveFile()
00287 {        
00288         sqlite3_close(m_annotationDb);        
00289         try
00290         {
00291             Fs::rm(m_dbFileName, false);
00292         }
00293         catch(...)
00294         {// Deleting the DB file in case of an error is not critical
00295             AptVerboseWrapper::out(1, "Error deleting the DB file!");
00296         }
00297 }

00299 sqlite3* AnnotationConverterEngine::OpenDb(std::string dbFileName)
00300 {      
00301     std::string dbNameUncPath = Fs::convertToUncPath(dbFileName);
00302 
00303     if (!Fs::fileExists(dbNameUncPath))
00304     {
00305         Err::errAbort("Database file '" + dbNameUncPath + "'" + " doesn't exist");      
00306     }
00307     
00308     if (sqlite3_open(dbNameUncPath.c_str(), &m_annotationDb) != SQLITE_OK) 
00309     {
00310         if (m_annotationDb != NULL)
00311         {
00312             sqlite3_close(m_annotationDb);
00313         }        
00314         Err::errAbort("Unable to open the database '" + dbNameUncPath + "'");   
00315      }          
00316      return m_annotationDb;
00317 }
00318 
00319  void AnnotationConverterEngine::AnalyzeHeaders()
00320  {        
00321     if (m_listOfTsvFiles.size() == 0)
00322     {
00323         return;
00324     }  
00325     else if (m_listOfTsvFiles.size() == 1)
00326     {
00327         AptVerboseWrapper::progressBegin(1, ANALYZING_FILE_HEADER, m_listOfTsvFiles.size(), 1, m_listOfTsvFiles.size());
00328     }
00329     else
00330     {
00331         AptVerboseWrapper::progressBegin(1, ANALYZING_FILES_HEADERS, m_listOfTsvFiles.size(), 1, m_listOfTsvFiles.size());
00332     }
00333 
00334     std::vector<string> errorColumns; // error if missing
00335     std::vector<string> warningColumns; // warning if missing
00336     std::vector<string> informationColumns;// information if missing
00337     
00338     RequiredColumn::AddRequiredRecommended(m_configuration.m_requiredColumnsPresence, errorColumns, warningColumns,informationColumns);
00339     RequiredColumn::AddRequiredRecommended(m_configuration.m_requiredColumnsSomeValue, errorColumns, warningColumns,informationColumns);
00340     RequiredColumn::AddRequiredRecommended(m_configuration.m_requiredColumnsNoEmptyValues, errorColumns, warningColumns, informationColumns);
00341     RequiredColumn::AddRequiredRecommended(m_configuration.m_requiredColumnsPrefixCheck, errorColumns, warningColumns, informationColumns);
00342 
00343                 
00344     std::vector<std::string>::iterator fileIterator;
00345     for (fileIterator = m_listOfTsvFiles.begin(); fileIterator != m_listOfTsvFiles.end(); fileIterator++)
00346     {
00347         std::string fileName = *fileIterator;        
00348         AnnotationTsv* tsvFile = new AnnotationTsv();        
00349         
00350         std::vector<string> columnsRequiredInEachFile;
00351         RequiredColumn::AddRequiredInEachFile(m_configuration.m_requiredColumnsNoEmptyValues, columnsRequiredInEachFile);
00352         
00353         if(tsvFile->open(fileName) != TSV_OK)
00354         {            
00355             delete(tsvFile);   
00356             
00357             std::string message = "Unable to open file '" + fileName + "'";
00358             throw Except(message.c_str());              
00359         }
00360         else
00361         {                         
00362             if (tsvFile->headersCount() == 0)
00363             {
00364                 AptVerboseWrapper::out(1, "WARNING! File '" + fileName + "' has no header." );
00365             }
00366             else
00367             {                                        
00368                 TsvFileHeaderLine* hdr;                 
00369                     while ((hdr = tsvFile->nextHeaderPtr()) != NULL)
00370                     {
00371                         //trim the value with empty ',' from excel export, such as "array_type,,,,,"
00372                         Util::trimString(hdr->m_value," ,\r\n\t");
00373                         m_csvHeadersToInformationTablePtr->AddVariable(fileName, hdr->m_key, hdr->m_value);                         
00374                     }
00375             }
00376             m_csvHeadersToInformationTablePtr->AddVariable(fileName, "array_type", m_arraySetName);
00377 
00378             int columnCount = tsvFile->GetColumnCount();
00379             
00380             for(int columnIndex = 0; columnIndex < columnCount; columnIndex++)
00381             {
00382                 
00383                 std::string csvColumnName = tsvFile->getColumnName(0, columnIndex);
00384                 StringUtilities::CheckColumnName(csvColumnName, columnIndex);
00385                 
00386                 std::vector<string>::iterator columnToFind =  find(errorColumns.begin(),errorColumns.end(), csvColumnName);
00387                 if (columnToFind != errorColumns.end())
00388                 {// Ok found it. Can delete 
00389                     errorColumns.erase(columnToFind);
00390                 }
00391                                  
00392                 columnToFind =  find(columnsRequiredInEachFile.begin(), columnsRequiredInEachFile.end(), csvColumnName);
00393                 if (columnToFind != columnsRequiredInEachFile.end())
00394                 {// Ok found it. Can delete 
00395                     columnsRequiredInEachFile.erase(columnToFind);
00396                 }
00397                                 
00398                 columnToFind =  find(warningColumns.begin(),warningColumns.end(), csvColumnName);
00399                 if (columnToFind != warningColumns.end())
00400                 {
00401                     warningColumns.erase(columnToFind);
00402                 }
00403                 
00404                 columnToFind =  find(informationColumns.begin(),informationColumns.end(), csvColumnName);
00405                 if (columnToFind != informationColumns.end())
00406                 {
00407                     informationColumns.erase(columnToFind);
00408                 }
00409                 
00410                 if (m_configuration.IsCloneableColumn(csvColumnName))
00411                 {
00412                     std::vector<string> columnClones = m_configuration.GetColumnClones(csvColumnName);            
00413                     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < columnClones.size(); i++)
00414                     {
00415                         string columnName = columnClones[i];
00416                         string cloneType = DB_TYPE_TEXT;
00417                         
00418                         map<string, string>::iterator columnTypes = m_configuration.m_cloneColumnTypes.find(columnName);        
00419                         if (columnTypes != m_configuration.m_cloneColumnTypes.end())
00420                         {
00421                             cloneType = columnTypes->second;
00422                         }
00423                         m_annotationTable->CheckIfNeedToAddColumn(columnName, cloneType);
00424                     }
00425                 }
00426                 else if (csvColumnName == m_configuration.m_par1CsvColumnName || csvColumnName == m_configuration.m_par2CsvColumnName)
00427                 {
00428                     m_annotationTable->CheckIfNeedToAddColumn( m_configuration.m_parDbColumnName,m_configuration.m_parDbColumnType);
00429                 }
00430                 else
00431                 {// "Normal" column                                            
00432                     std::string dbColumnName = m_localizationTable->GetDbColumnName(csvColumnName);
00433                     if (dbColumnName.empty())
00434                     { 
00435                         m_localizationTable->AppendColumnToAddList(csvColumnName);
00436                         dbColumnName = StringUtilities::MakeColumnName(csvColumnName);
00437                     }                     
00438                     m_annotationTable->CheckIfNeedToAddColumn(csvColumnName);
00439                 }                
00440              }             
00441          }
00442          
00443          tsvFile->close();
00444          delete(tsvFile); 
00445          
00446          if (columnsRequiredInEachFile.size() > 0)
00447          {
00448             std::stringstream  message;
00449             message << "The following required column(s) are missing in the '" << Fs::basename(fileName) << "': ";
00450             
00451             for(unsigned int i = 0; i < columnsRequiredInEachFile.size(); i++)
00452             {
00453                 if (i > 0) message << ", ";    
00454                 
00455                 message << "'" << columnsRequiredInEachFile[i] << "'";
00456             }
00457             throw Except(message.str().c_str());
00458          }
00459          
00460          AptVerboseWrapper::progressStep(1);
00461      }
00462      
00463      AptVerboseWrapper::progressEnd(1, "\nDone");
00464      
00465      if (informationColumns.size() > 0)
00466      {
00467         std::stringstream  message;
00468         message << "The following recommended column(s) are missing: ";
00469         
00470         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < informationColumns.size(); i++)
00471         {
00472             if (i > 0) message << ", ";    
00473             
00474             message << "'" << informationColumns[i] << "'";
00475         }
00476         
00477         Verbose::out(0, message.str());
00478      }
00479      
00480      if (warningColumns.size() > 0)
00481      {
00482         std::stringstream  message;
00483         message << "Warning! The following recommended column(s) are missing: ";
00484         
00485         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < warningColumns.size(); i++)
00486         {
00487             if (i > 0) message << ", ";    
00488             
00489             message << "'" << warningColumns[i] << "'";
00490         }
00491         
00492         Verbose::out(0, message.str());
00493      }
00494      
00495      if (errorColumns.size() > 0)
00496      {
00497         std::stringstream  message;
00498         message << "The following required column(s) are missing: ";
00499         
00500         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < errorColumns.size(); i++)
00501         {
00502             if (i > 0) message << ", ";    
00503             
00504             message << "'" << errorColumns[i] << "'";
00505         }
00506         throw Except(message.str().c_str());
00507      }          
00508              
00509      
00510      m_csvHeadersToInformationTablePtr->ValueMismatchReport = &AnnotationConverterEngine::ValueMismatchReport;
00511      m_csvHeadersToInformationTablePtr->MissingValueReport = &AnnotationConverterEngine::MissingValueReport;
00512      
00513      ValidationResult validationResult = m_csvHeadersToInformationTablePtr->AnalyzeHeaders();
00514      if (validationResult == ValueMismatch)
00515      {
00516          std::string message = "Header variable(s) have mismatching values:\n";
00517          for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m_valueMismatchReportContent.size(); i++)
00518          {
00519             message += m_valueMismatchReportContent[i] + "\n";
00520          }                  
00521          throw Except(message.c_str());
00522      }
00523      if (validationResult == MissingValue)
00524      {
00525          AptVerboseWrapper::out(0,"WARNING! Header variable(s) have missing or empty values:");
00526          for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m_missingValueReportContent.size(); i++)
00527          {
00528             AptVerboseWrapper::out(0,m_missingValueReportContent[i]);
00529          }         
00530      }     
00531      
00532      m_annotationTable->AddColumns();
00533      m_localizationTable->AddRecords();
00534  
00535  }
00536  
00537               
00538 void AnnotationConverterEngine::AnalyzeTsvFiles()
00539 {   
00540     AnalyzeHeaders();
00541     m_annotationTable->AnalyzeFiles(m_listOfTsvFiles);
00542 }
00543 
00544 void AnnotationConverterEngine::ValueMismatchReport(string VarName, map<string, string> FileValueMap)
00545 {
00546     string message = "Variable Name: '" + VarName + "' ";
00547     
00548     map<string, string>::iterator pos;    
00549     for (pos = FileValueMap.begin(); pos != FileValueMap.end(); pos++)
00550     {
00551         if (pos != FileValueMap.begin())
00552         {
00553             message += ", ";
00554         }
00555         message += "File '" + Fs::basename(pos->first) + "' Value: '" + pos->second + "'";
00556     }
00557     m_valueMismatchReportContent.push_back(message);
00558 }
00559 
00560 void AnnotationConverterEngine::MissingValueReport(string VarName, vector<string> Files)
00561 {
00562     string message = "Variable Name: '" + VarName + "' File(s): ";
00563     
00564     vector<string>::iterator pos;
00565     for (pos = Files.begin(); pos != Files.end(); pos++)
00566     {
00567         if (pos != Files.begin())
00568         {
00569             message += ", ";
00570         }
00571         message += "'" + Fs::basename(*pos) + "'";
00572     }
00573     m_missingValueReportContent.push_back(message);
00574 }
00575

00577 
00578 
00579 void CopyFile(string in, string out) 
00580 {
00581     
00582         std::ifstream ins(in.c_str(), std::ios::binary);
00583         std::ofstream outs(out.c_str(), std::ios::binary);
00584         outs << ins.rdbuf();
00585         ins.close();
00586         outs.close();
00587 }
00588 
00589     
00590 void AnnotationConverterEngine::checkDiskSpaceImp() 
00591 {
00592 
00593     std::string dbTemplateUncPath = Fs::convertToUncPath(m_dbTemplate);    
00594     std::string dbFileUncPath = Fs::convertToUncPath(m_dbFileName);
00595     
00596     CopyFile(dbTemplateUncPath, dbFileUncPath);
00597     
00598     if (!Fs::fileExists(dbFileUncPath))
00599     {
00600         Err::errAbort("Cannot copy the template file '" + dbTemplateUncPath + "' to the DB file '" + dbFileUncPath + "'");        
00601     }
00602     
00603     std::string fullPath = Fs::convertToUncPath(m_dbFileName, true);
00604     string dirname = Fs::dirname(fullPath);    
00605     
00606     int64_t out_disk_available = Fs::getFreeDiskSpace(dirname);      
00607     
00608     if (out_disk_available != -1)
00609     {// If getAvailableDiskSpace could not determine disk space it returns -1. Skip verification
00610         int64_t requiredDiskSpace = 0;
00611         std::vector<std::string>::iterator fileIterator;    
00612         for (fileIterator = m_listOfTsvFiles.begin(); fileIterator != m_listOfTsvFiles.end(); fileIterator++)
00613         {
00614             std::string fileName = *fileIterator; 
00615             requiredDiskSpace += Fs::fileSize(fileName, false);
00616         }    
00617         
00618         requiredDiskSpace = requiredDiskSpace * 2.3; //  Worst case scenario: 2  ASCII file UTF16 db, plus 0.3 "safety buffer"
00619         
00620         if (out_disk_available < requiredDiskSpace)
00621         {
00622             std::stringstream message;
00623             message << "Your disc has insufficient space. You need to have at least " << requiredDiskSpace << " bytes of free space.";
00624 
00625             Err::errAbort(message.str());
00626         }
00627     }
00628 }
00629 
00630 /*  Commenting out - appears to be windows specific, and doesn't appear to be used anywhere -AK
00631 std::string AnnotationConverterEngine::GetErrorMsg()
00632 {
00633         void* lpMsgBuf;
00634         if (!FormatMessage( 
00635                         FORMAT_MESSAGE_ALLOCATE_BUFFER | 
00636                         FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_SYSTEM | 
00637                         FORMAT_MESSAGE_IGNORE_INSERTS,
00638                         NULL,
00639                         GetLastError(),
00640                         MAKELANGID(LANG_NEUTRAL, SUBLANG_DEFAULT), // Default language
00641                         (LPTSTR) &lpMsgBuf,
00642                         0,
00643                         NULL ))
00644         {
00645                 // Handle the error.
00646                 return "";
00647         }
00648 
00649         std::string message = (char*)lpMsgBuf;
00650 
00651         // Free the buffer.
00652         LocalFree( lpMsgBuf );
00653 
00654         return message;
00655 }
00656 
00657 */
00658 
00659 void AnnotationConverterEngine::runImp() 
00660     {        
00661     AptVerboseWrapper::progressBegin(1, "Loading configuration files\n", 2, 1, 2);
00662     string congigName = programPath + ".config";
00663     if (Fs::fileExists(congigName)) 
00664     {
00665       LoadConfiguration(congigName);
00666     }
00667     else
00668     {
00669         AptVerboseWrapper::out(1, "Could not find configuration file " + congigName);
00670     }
00671     AptVerboseWrapper::progressStep(1);// Found or not we need to report a step since the UI tool expects fixed number of steps
00672     
00673     LoadConfiguration(m_arraySpecificConfig);
00674     AptVerboseWrapper::progressStep(1);
00675     AptVerboseWrapper::progressEnd(1, "\nDone");
00676     
00677     
00678     sqlite3* m_annotationDb = NULL;
00679     
00680     
00681     try
00682     {        
00683         AptVerboseWrapper::progressBegin(1, "Loading the database\n", 1, 1, 1);
00684         
00685         m_annotationDb = OpenDb(m_dbFileName);                            
00686         
00687         m_localizationTable = new LocalizationTable(m_annotationDb,&m_configuration);
00688         m_localizationTable->Load();    
00689         
00690         m_chromosomeTable = new ChromosomeTable(m_annotationDb);
00691         m_chromosomeTable->Load();
00692         
00693         m_cdfInformationTable = new CdfInformationTable(m_annotationDb,&m_configuration);        
00694         m_cdfInformationTable->Update();
00695         
00696         m_annotationTable = new AnnotationTable(m_annotationDb, &m_configuration, m_localizationTable, m_chromosomeTable);
00697         m_annotationTable->LoadColumntTypes();
00698         
00699         m_csvHeadersToInformationTablePtr = new CsvHeadersToInformationTable(m_annotationDb, &m_configuration);
00700         m_csvHeadersToInformationTablePtr->LoadInformationTable();
00701         
00702         AptVerboseWrapper::progressStep(1);
00703         AptVerboseWrapper::progressEnd(1, "\nDone");
00704         
00705         AnalyzeTsvFiles();
00706     }
00707     catch (std::exception& exception)
00708     {   
00709         CloseDbAndRemoveFile();
00710             Err::errAbort(exception.what());        
00711     }           
00712         
00713     
00714     BeginTransaction();    
00715     bool success = false;
00716     try
00717     {
00718         success = m_annotationTable->InsertTsvFiles(m_listOfTsvFiles);        
00719     }
00720     catch(std::exception& exception)
00721     {
00722          CloseDbAndRemoveFile();
00723              Err::errAbort(exception.what());
00724     }
00725     if (success)
00726     {    
00727         
00728         AptVerboseWrapper::progressBegin(1, "Completing the database\n", 1, 1, 1);
00729         CommitTransaction();        
00730         try
00731         {            
00732         
00733             BeginTransaction();
00734             m_csvHeadersToInformationTablePtr->UpdateInformationTable();
00735             CommitTransaction();
00736         
00737             sqlite3_close(m_annotationDb);                    
00738             AptVerboseWrapper::progressStep(1);            
00739             AptVerboseWrapper::progressEnd(1, "\nDone");            
00740             AptVerboseWrapper::out(1, "\nProgram finished", true);            
00741         }
00742         catch (std::exception& exception)
00743         {        
00744             CloseDbAndRemoveFile();
00745                 Err::errAbort(exception.what());
00746             }
00747     }
00748     else
00749     {
00750         CloseDbAndRemoveFile();
00751         Err::errAbort("See log file for details.");
00752     }            
00753 }
